channel.title: go-oidc on Ed-M.dev
channel.description: Recent content in go-oidc on Ed-M.dev

item.description: 211106 Clients so planning out the objects/clients etc… I am going with conduit for the app name for now so from my current understanding I am going to need one for the backend(data)(conduit-backend) not super positive on this on if I use a object relation mapper but just in case i think it mite be redundant one for the browser app(conduit-browser) one for the server side interactions api calls (conduit-server-side) Groups At least to start i am just going to have these groups I am going to lean on keycloak to handle what user have access to what servers(discord term) for now I am not postive this best way, but speed is the name of the game right now I need to get some Proof of Concept completed sooner than later.
